feature.label: ASM Plugin 6-2
feature.description: Plugin for ASM 6.2.x version The plugin helps users to manage Attributes and Policies from ASM and vice-versa Policy Management - Download Policies from ASM - Upload Policies to ASM Attribute Management - Download Dictionary Attributes from ASM - Upload Attributes into ASM dictionary - Translate ALFA Dictionary Attributes to XML Attributes - Translates XML dictionary Attributes to ALFA Attributes Copyright (c) 2012-2019, Axiomatics AB Check http://www.axiomatics.com for updates, documentation and support.
